subject: "The Insider" - News Bulletin
body:
LATEST NEWS HEADLINES

America has now provoked a new arms race against Russia and China
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2468

Red Cross reports that the US and UK are making things much worse in Iraq
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2467

Iraq violence is mainly resistance to occupation, it will stop when US and 
UK go home
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2469


OTHER IMPORTANT HEADLINES

Australia to double the number of its troops in Afghanistan, east of Iran
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2466

British Marines released by Iran sell their stories to the media
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2465

Iranian diplomat released from US base in Iraq describes torture by CIA
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2464

British captives released by Iran attend press conference to read 
pre-written statements
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2463

US regime uses prisons to suppress free-speech and silence Israel's 
critics
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2462

Wolfowitz gives huge pay rise to his girlfriend and top jobs to friends at 
World Bank
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2461

British prisoners released by Iran were spying on 'Iranian activities'
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2460

CIA director profiting from 9/11 and 'war on terror'
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2458

Fire at anti-Israel group in New York treated as 'suspicious' by police
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2459

UK's top police chief Sir Ian Blair had career success after lying about 
IRA siege
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2457

China joins Iran in abandoning the US dollar and switches to Euros
http://www.theinsider.org/news/article.asp?id=2456
